name: Mommy Life Simulator
description:
This game is the extension of Virtual Mom : Happy Family 3D in which virtual Mommy is doing household activities to assist her family.

Forget about other boring routines and open the Pandora of amusement and fun. Play the variety of activities like dish washing, preparing breakfasts and lunches for children, house cleaning, feeding the dog, fishing, shopping and bringing goods for kids and many more. There are different activities in each room. Your main task is to keep the family happy.

It’s all about having fun and enjoyment and to learn it's not an easy task to be a mommy!

You can customize your mom according to your taste. Full character customization feature is going to add more fun in this game. Make your mommy Indian, Chinese or American!
There are many different random events to respond to, all of them adding surprise to this simulation game and unexpected elements to routine, daily virtual life. This is task based game. Every level has variety of tasks to complete, with completion of every level variety of tasks increases. Don’t let your family down!

Show the world you are the best MOM!

Mommy Features:
• Interesting gameplay and multiple 3D levels
• Precise controls for the given activities
• Exciting and fun-filled daily routine tasks
• Realistic sounds and graphics
• Mommy life-simulation game
• Fun & Easy to play
